rows.label: qev070101_MSG0064
rows.name:
Come on, Veven! You get to become a cornerstone for
the next dazzling chapter of science![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070101_MSG0065
rows.name:
You Ma-non are disciples of science, aren't you?
Now stop your whining and get in the damn car.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070101_MSG0066
rows.name:
Sorry, Professor B, but I think this thing is more of a
tombstone than a cornerstone, you know?
And I'm probably too young to die?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070101_MSG0067
rows.name:
Damn! I finally get a test rig up and working,
and you're going to pull this crap on me?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070101_JNK0150
rows.name: Probe

rows.label: qev070101_SEL0151
rows.name: Inquire as to what is going on here.

rows.label: qev070101_JNK0160
rows.name: Query

rows.label: qev070101_SEL0161
rows.name: Ask Professor B who the Ma-non is.

rows.label: qev070101_MSG0068
rows.name:
Absolutely nothing—that's the problem! I brought
my assistant Veven here to play guinea pig for me,
but he's gone chicken![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070101_MSG0069
rows.name: He's my worthless assistant, Veven.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070101_MSG0070
rows.name:
I gave him the honor of riding in my Miramobile time
machine, and he repays me with a silly tantrum![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070101_MSG0071
rows.name:
And after you went to the trouble of furnishing this
perfectly serviceable car![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070101_MSG0072
rows.name: And after you rushed out to find us this old jalopy![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070101_MSG0073
rows.name:
And after you went to the trouble of getting us this
sweet ride![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070101_MSG0074
rows.name:
No more excuses, Veven! Are you trying to put all this
poor [ST:gender p1=man's p2=woman's ] hard work to waste?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070101_MSG0075
rows.name:
Well, I don't want to to do that, but time travel seems
pretty dangerous, doesn't it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070101_MSG0076
rows.name:
I'm as intrigued about science as as anyone,
but I've only got one life to give to it, you know?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070101_MSG0077
rows.name: What, you don't trust me?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070101_MSG0078
rows.name:
If you're so confident, maybe you should be the one
to take it for a ride, Professor? You're weirdly insistent
that I be the one who tests it, you know?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070101_MSG0079
rows.name:
Well, of course! If I got sucked into a stray #k»*#+‹,
I'd be torn to shreds instantl—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070101_MSG0080
rows.name: ...Leeeave it to me! It's fine. I didn't say a thing.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070101_MSG0081
rows.name:
I think that's probably the opposite of fine?
Either way, I'm not getting in that vehicle.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070101_MSG0082
rows.name:
Then it appears we are at an impasse here.
...Hey, kid, help me talk some sense into this fool![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070101_JNK0170
rows.name: Hype

rows.label: qev070101_SEL0171
rows.name: Appeal to Veven's emotions to fire him up.

rows.label: qev070101_JNK0180
rows.name: Persuade

rows.label: qev070101_SEL0181
rows.name: Use logic to appeal to Veven's intellect.

rows.label: qev070101_MSG0083
rows.name:
Wow, you're really eager. And it's not that I don't
share that enthusiasm, you know? Otherwise I'd never
have agreed to all of Professor B's madness until now.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070101_MSG0084
rows.name:
Of course I'm interested in in a time machine.
But I'm not risking my life, if that makes sense?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070101_MSG0085
rows.name:
...What's that? Scientific progress has always been
built on on knowledge and self-sacrificing dedication
in equal parts?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070101_MSG0086
rows.name:
...I should hang up my lab coat right now if I can't
accept that? Science isn't just fun and games?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070101_MSG0087
rows.name: Well, that stings.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070101_MSG0088
rows.name:
I suppose you seem like a smart person?
Different than my scientific mind, maybe, but still...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070101_MSG0089
rows.name:
I hear what you're saying, but none of it proves that
I'll be be all right if I get in that time machine,
if that makes sense?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070101_MSG0090
rows.name:
...What's that? Even if this test fails, Professor B will
eventually succeed?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070101_MSG0091
rows.name:
And then he he just needs to jump back to the moment
before this test?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070101_MSG0092
rows.name:
And that way the machine from that successful trial will
replace this initial failed prototype?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070101_MSG0093
rows.name:
Meaning I won't actually die in the canonical timeline?
Hmmm...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070101_MSG0094
rows.name:
I feel like there's some circular reasoning in there
somewhere, but I think I'm...warming to to the idea?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070101_MSG0095
rows.name:
All right, Professor. I'll ride in your time machine.
I hope I don't regret this...?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070101_MSG0096
rows.name:
You'll do it? Ha ha! I'd expect nothing less from my
intrepid Ma-non assistant![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070101_MSG0097
rows.name:
And nice work with the smooth talk there, [ST:gender p1=sir p2=ma'am ].
...All right! Now that we have a test subject,
let's get this party started![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070101_MSG0098
rows.name: Hurry up and get in the Miramobile, Veven![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070101_MSG0099
rows.name:
I'm ready for you to send me to whatever dark corner
of history you want, okay?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070101_MSG0100
rows.name:
Roger that! The y#$k+\\\\••* is online...
Setting destination for three thousand years
in the future![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070101_MSG0101
rows.name:
Veven, are you ready to slip the bonds of time and
take flight into that bright and distant tomorrow?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070101_MSG0102
rows.name: Absolutely! ...Er, I think? Yes?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070101_MSG0103
rows.name: Hrrngh...? Heeeere IIIII gooooOOOOOOOOOOOO![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070101_MSG0104
rows.name:
Now, my precious Miramobile! Smash through the
walls of the fourth dimension and rewrite the laws of
the universe![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070101_MSG0105
rows.name: ......[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070101_MSG0121
rows.name:
The numbers were there. It reached the threshold.
So why...?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070101_MSG0122
rows.name:
Damn! I swear on my own brain that I'll fly this thing
to the future. You just get me that topaz wine, kid![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070101_MSG0123
rows.name:
Well? Did you get the topaz wine, kid? It's the last
thing I need to soup up my magnificent Miramobile.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070101_MSG0124
rows.name: Excellent work! I'll install it right now...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070101_MSG0125
rows.name: ......[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070101_MSG0126
rows.name:
There. Done. Behold the Counter-y#$k+\\\\••*
Navigation Edition of my beautiful machine![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070101_MSG0127
rows.name:
It's my ultimate creation, capable of overriding every
causal factor in Miran space-time![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070101_JNK0210
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: qev070101_SEL0211
rows.name: Ask who is piloting it this time.

rows.label: qev070101_JNK0220
rows.name: Worry

rows.label: qev070101_SEL0221
rows.name: Express concern that this will be another failed trial.

rows.label: qev070101_MSG0128
rows.name:
A most astute question!
I certainly can't trust that shrimp to do it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070101_MSG0129
rows.name:
This time, I'll drive to the future myself.
The perfect pilot for the perfect machine.
There's not a sliver of a chance of failure![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070101_MSG0130
rows.name: Heh. Quite the nervous nelly, aren't you?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070101_MSG0131
rows.name:
There's no chance of failure with this machine.
Besides, this time it'll have a competent pilot—me![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070101_MSG0132
rows.name:
This is good-bye for now, but don't worry, kid.
I may literally be back before you know it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070101_JNK0230
rows.name: Send Off

rows.label: qev070101_SEL0231
rows.name: See Professor B off to the future with a broad smile.

rows.label: qev070101_JNK0240
rows.name: Regret

rows.label: qev070101_SEL0241
rows.name: Tell Professor B how much you will miss him.

rows.label: qev070101_MSG0133
rows.name:
I appreciate that, kid.
Emotional good-byes make me itch.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070101_MSG0134
rows.name: Now then... It's time for the trial run![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070101_MSG0135
rows.name:
Bah! I'm sure we'll meet again,
sometime, somewhere, kid.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070101_MSG0136
rows.name: But for now... Commencing the trial run![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070101_MSG0137
rows.name:
Setting destination time past the far side of the future,
to the time axis I once inhabited...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070101_MSG0138
rows.name:
You, Veven, and the others in this time have been a
great help.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070101_MSG0139
rows.name:
Heh. Though I could have done without the ones that
attacked us.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070101_MSG0140
rows.name:
Thanks for everything, [ST:playername ].
Give Veven my regards.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070101_MSG0141
rows.name: Take care. And farewell![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070101_MSG0142
rows.name:
Even if this is good-bye forever,
know that I'll never forget you![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070101_MSG0143
rows.name: Ha ha, that's right![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070101_MSG0144
rows.name:
Tear through that a••*%$k with 3«*@-/x, girl!
We're off to the FUTURE![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070101_MSG0145
rows.name:
...Hmm? Where did Professor B go? He asked me to
buy these parts he he was running low on...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070101_MSG0146
rows.name: ...WHAT?! He went home to the future?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070101_MSG0147
rows.name:
Just like that? We did everything together all this time,
and now he just takes off?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070101_JNK0250
rows.name: Deduce

rows.label: qev070101_SEL0251
rows.name: Assume Professor B's intentions.

rows.label: qev070101_JNK0260
rows.name: Relay

rows.label: qev070101_SEL0261
rows.name: Tell Veven that Professor B said he was grateful.

rows.label: qev070101_MSG0148
rows.name:
I suppose I didn't think of of his feelings in all this.
You humans are sensitive to that sort of thing, yes?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070101_MSG0149
rows.name:
It's true that for all his bluster, he always had
something of a...bashful side?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070101_MSG0150
rows.name:
Maybe he couldn't say good-bye face-to-face BECAUSE
we went through so much together?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070101_MSG0151
rows.name: He thanked ME? I wish he'd said it to to my face...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070101_MSG0152
rows.name:
If not for you, was he planning to leave without saying
a word?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070101_MSG0153
rows.name: *sigh* The man was a real headache, you know?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070101_MSG0154
rows.name:
I'll just have to get to work on building a new and
improved Miramobile Mark II, I suppose?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070101_MSG0155
rows.name:
I'll ride it to the future and scare the pants off of
Professor B! That would be pretty funny, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070101_MSG0156
rows.name:
I guess I have a lot of of studying ahead of me, huh?
Just you wait, Professor![ST:wait ]
